font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My son travelled all\nthe way to City\u2019s stadium too, and sat on the seat of Tevez in the player\u2019s\nlounge ( I am a Tevez fan ) , just for mE sake.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><br /></b></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><br /></b></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><br /></b></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CyPvb96Mh-k/UXyQuDIoi6I/AAAAAAAAh2A/MX_5O2qCPsE/s1600/imagesglgu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CyPvb96Mh-k/UXyQuDIoi6I/AAAAAAAAh2A/MX_5O2qCPsE/s1600/imagesglgu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a lot more to\nsoccer than what meets the eye. &nbsp;&nbsp;A good soccer manager understands \u201cteam\ndynamics\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my official email messages\nfrom my ship, under my signature would be a subtle \u201cteam dynamics\u201d message. Officially\nI am NOT allowed to do this. &nbsp;But then\nwho is gonna bell the cat? \u2013 nobody tried.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Needless to say, the recipients\nof my emails used to telephone me and say that they always read my \u201cRE-INVENTING\nTEAM DYNAMICS \u201c ( RITD ) agent provocateur punch lines first and then only the\nread the actual message. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the\nYanks used to save these punch lines in a word document , because their wives\nand children back home can read it\u2014 they thought it was eastern mysticism . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">Punch into Google\nsearch </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">TEAM WORK, TEAM DYNAMICS VADAKAYIL.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can check it out\nyourself \u2013 basically &nbsp;<b><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cThought for the\nday\u201d .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></i></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my case every punch line\nrelated to something which happened the previous day\u2014 &nbsp;it alluded to something\nand somebody, and people in the shore offices used to put 2 and 2 together , &nbsp;make it 5 and have a nice laugh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you noticed how\nSir Alex Ferguson sits in the stands , furiously chewing gum , watching team\ndynamics\u2014the natural forces at play and determine is they are acting for good.&nbsp; He will make interventions to make the effect\nof those dynamics more positive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coaching will be provided later to make up any\nskill deficiencies. He quickly determines the teams strength and weaknesses and\ntailors new approaches. He provides feedback to correct unproductive moves.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A well knit team takes\non a life of its own and the managers job is to nurture and maintain it. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each member of the team\nis entitled to be interested in all aspects of the operation. This is not\ncancelled out by the fact that he has special responsibilities in a limited\narea, like the goal keeper in a soccer team. This creates higher levels of job\nsatisfaction and commitment plus higher levels of trust and support.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teamwork creates the\nforum for the common man to attain uncommon results. &nbsp;A bunch of superstars stars do NOT meake a\nteam. A group in itself does not necessarily constitute a team. Members of a &nbsp;team must have complementary and diversified\nskills committed to a common purpose, where they use their strengths in full\nand can complement for each others weakness.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to be a good\nteam player one has to unselfish, compromise and even sacrifice .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hostility among team\nmembers and low participation are symptoms that signal a need for team\nbuilding. Morale problems do not happen overnight and they cannot be resolved\novernight. Conflict resolution is not a stand alone skill. Without this skill\nthe team cannot bond. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The team members\nmust know what is expected of them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the manager\u2019s job\nto provide a positive and congenial climate .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good team has\nflexibility and synergy and achieves more than the sum of its parts. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the job of the manager to identify\nissues that inhibit the team. He must address those issues and remove the\ninhibitors.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manager must have\npeople skills. &nbsp;Sir Alex Ferguson does\nNOT have it, as he treated several players shabbily , keeping his ego in front.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Team members must know how\nto examine team and individual errors and weaknesses without making personal\nattacks. The manager must be able to identify jealousy and defensive behavior. &nbsp;He must build a feeling of solidarity and team\nspirit. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has to look out for the cynical\nlone ranger who ignores others, and survives by being servile to the manager\nwho can make or break him. &nbsp;&nbsp;Don\u2019t excuse a badly behaving team member.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people are just\nnegative by nature. Don\u2019t hesitate to confront such cynical team destroyers and\ndemand behavior change at once. Some people lack confidence and view attacks on\ntheir opinions as a personal attack. A typical statement would be \u201care you\ntelling that my 20 years of experience does not matter?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Team building cannot be\na short term flavour of the months.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Music orchestra bands\nare a clear example of how a team works. Poor performing bands are inflexible,\nthe musicians have petty differences, compete with each other, stay in their\ncomfort zones and expect the audience to accommodate their jarring music.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just plain old Harmony\nis not the goal of cross functional teamwork . &nbsp;False consensus is undesirable where team\nmembers are afraid to express a contrary point of view for fear it will destroy\nthe positive feelings among team members. &nbsp;An absence of overt conflict is often mistaken\nfor teamwork.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conflict is natural and desirable. Issues are attacked \u2013not each\nother. If conflict is not visible , either the people are thinking alike or\nthey have suppressed conflict. Both situations are not helpful. Teams that\nsuppress conflict lose effectiveness and the conflict erupts into destructive\nways. A good leader will not allow endless debates on minor problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good manager knows\nthe importance of understanding another point of view. He knows that progress\nhas been made on this planet only through disobedience and rebellion-- and that\npeople with spirit , passion and courage have always been sinister to the\nwalking dead.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strength of character and courage of\nconvictions is NEVER mistaken for poor attitude. He communicates in the\nlanguage of his people NOT in fuckin' latin. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good manager will not\nconvert men by silencing them. He knows when he praises everybody he praises\nnobody.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is no\nsynergy in the team, the people are passive. &nbsp;If bonuses and incentives are part of the\nreward system, they should be given to teams performance\u2014not individual\nperformance. Team culture is destroyed by racism, inappropriate race based pay\nsystems ( which cannot be avoided in soccer ) , and destructive comments from\nmanagement. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">You must now punch into\nGoogle search </span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">TEVEZ MANCINI FIGHT ADVISE TO SOCCER MANAGERS VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/6b-s4xQfZ_M/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/6b-s4xQfZ_M&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/6b-s4xQfZ_M&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: Video in which Adolf Hitler gets pissed off with Carlos Tevez.</span></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cookbook approach\ncannot be taken to build teams. Team members often tend to want to clone\nthemselves and invite participants \u201cjust like me\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be sensitive to\nfriction. &nbsp;Nip it in the bud before it\nends in a full scale war with everybody taking sides. &nbsp;Let it be known that feuding wont be\ntolerated. &nbsp;Reason with them. &nbsp;Don\u2019t take sides\u2014but take swift and resolute\naction. &nbsp;Players &nbsp;must be polite, friendly and kind . &nbsp;Players are entitled to respect, civilised\nbehaviour and dignity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you take sides then\nyou are part of the argument and the disagreement. You as a leader have to\nremain totally objective and in the middle. Being conciliatory is like mother\nhen breaking up a fight between 2 of her chicks.. You just want to restore\npeace. You will not spend inordinate time in finding out who pecked whose ass\nfirst.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your rules say that\nthere can be no bullying, shouting, threatening , intimidation or victimisation\nin your team. This is abuse. Every player is allowed to refuse abuse . If\nsomebody is not doing his job he should be taken aside and his mistakes pointed\nout calmly and rationally.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the team comes to\nwork looking to enjoy themselves, be stretched and challenged then you can get\nthe best out of them. It is the job of the manager to get them emotionally\ninvolved and instill pride . Getting your team to soar takes passion and\ndetermination.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one can whistle a symphony\u2014it takes an orchestra to play it.\nBe ready to prune dead wood, straggly growth and tone deaf lousy flute players.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The force of a team\nlike a typhoon takes time to grow\u2014but once it is spinning, it is a formidable\nthing indeed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/zKksMZdJdgY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/zKksMZdJdgY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/zKksMZdJdgY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><i><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Above video: &nbsp;A die hard Arsenal fan gets pissed off with&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">captain</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;of team Robin Van Persie for leaving Arsenal and joining Manchester United ( 24 Million pounds ).. &nbsp;In the Aston Villa match Van Persie (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">exulting</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;below ) scored a fine hatrick.</span></span></i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><i><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5d2xpwqWYFE/UXymD9yQzeI/AAAAAAAAh2Q/_MBjfc4S3Is/s1600/images+(3).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5d2xpwqWYFE/UXymD9yQzeI/AAAAAAAAh2Q/_MBjfc4S3Is/s400/images+(3).jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><i><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To add insult to\ninjury, today the entire Arsenal team have to stand as guard of honour in the player's tunnel during entry -- in the\nmatch against champions of EPL Manchester United.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JZt6I0JXIxM/UXyqGN3G8cI/AAAAAAAAh2o/Skl4Yg32HFA/s1600/imagesioby89.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JZt6I0JXIxM/UXyqGN3G8cI/AAAAAAAAh2o/Skl4Yg32HFA/s400/imagesioby89.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"283\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><i><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Old Trafford is in my\nopinion the greatest and most famous sporting arena on this planet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Old Trafford, Greater\nManchester, England, and the home of Manchester United. With a capacity of\n75,765&nbsp; Old Trafford is the\nsecond-largest football stadium in the United Kingdom after Wembley.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oQ9NXIFZtzI/UXy_f67WzhI/AAAAAAAAh34/QRGr3YlsfC0/s1600/oldtrafford1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oQ9NXIFZtzI/UXy_f67WzhI/AAAAAAAAh34/QRGr3YlsfC0/s400/oldtrafford1.jpg\" height=\"242\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German\nbombing raids on 22 December 1940 and another one on 11 March 1941 destroyed\nmuch of the stadium.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Old Trafford celebrated its 100th anniversary on 19\nFebruary 2010.&nbsp; The rise of hooliganism\nin the 1970s saw the erection of the country\u2019s first perimeter fence. There are\nlots of loud drunk guys cursing at every call they disagree with by the referee\nor even at players who aren't putting in their 100% &nbsp;in their expert estimation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fFSaOzPxoN4/UXy_na5esKI/AAAAAAAAh4A/y26K0KBJ1gI/s1600/old-trafford-manchester-united-stadium-plan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fFSaOzPxoN4/UXy_na5esKI/AAAAAAAAh4A/y26K0KBJ1gI/s400/old-trafford-manchester-united-stadium-plan.jpg\" height=\"285\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They make a lot of\nmoney by conducted tours . &nbsp;Probably more than\n350,000 people visit every year. &nbsp;Today\nthe tour charge is 16 pounds. &nbsp;Since my\nson is a member he was charged only 8 pounds. Tour includes the dugouts,\nplayers tunnel, and the Manchester United Museum and lasts about 70 minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mWMgUDL4yQg/UXy__ki9KcI/AAAAAAAAh4Q/zsmPq4l83PE/s1600/1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mWMgUDL4yQg/UXy__ki9KcI/AAAAAAAAh4Q/zsmPq4l83PE/s400/1.jpg\" height=\"258\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manchester United\nmembers receive priority when applying for tickets for high-profile matches. Ticket\nprices range from \u00a330.00 for a lower-tier seat behind one of the goals to\n\u00a352.00 for a central seat at the Alex Ferguson or South Stand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The souvenir shops do\nroaring trade The ground was given the nickname \u201cTheatre of Dreams\u201d by Bobby\nCharlton, who survived the Munich aircrash. &nbsp;The museum was opened on 11 April 1998 by Pel\u00e9.\n&nbsp;There is a &nbsp;chapel, where hard core Manchester\nUnited fans get married.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hoAIIFkP9vk/UXy_Pvnia1I/AAAAAAAAh3w/51LouiBrj3M/s1600/images+(6).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hoAIIFkP9vk/UXy_Pvnia1I/AAAAAAAAh3w/51LouiBrj3M/s400/images+(6).jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 6 February 1958, the\nBritish European Airways Flight 609 crashed on its third attempt to take off\nfrom a slush-covered runway at Munich-Riem Airport in Munich, West Germany,\nwith the entire Manchester United team inside.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rDlcZPnlAaQ/UXy_E3aQyII/AAAAAAAAh3o/cjZnKhCuehI/s1600/images+(5).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rDlcZPnlAaQ/UXy_E3aQyII/AAAAAAAAh3o/cjZnKhCuehI/s320/images+(5).jpg\" height=\"179\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The team was returning from a\nEuropean Cup match in Belgrade, Yugoslavia (now Serbia), against Red Star\nBelgrade, and had stopped in Munich for refueling. &nbsp;It was snowing heavily , causing a layer of\nslush to build up at the far end of the runway. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xZrKNyH2n6o/UXy-Vunvh7I/AAAAAAAAh3Y/1jDUkgiVVVE/s1600/imagesIUVOL.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xZrKNyH2n6o/UXy-Vunvh7I/AAAAAAAAh3Y/1jDUkgiVVVE/s400/imagesIUVOL.jpg\" height=\"297\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the aircraft hit the slush, it lost\nvelocity, making take-off impossible. &nbsp;It\nploughed through a fence past the end of the runway, before the port wing hit a\nnearby house with a fuel tank inside causing an explosion .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J3BaOtt2OYU/UXy-1ToDMCI/AAAAAAAAh3g/y9WOHhahpeY/s1600/Munich_Clock.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J3BaOtt2OYU/UXy-1ToDMCI/AAAAAAAAh3g/y9WOHhahpeY/s1600/Munich_Clock.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">22 people of the 44\npeople in the plane were killed, of which 8 were Manchester United players.\nSome of the survivors never played again.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is also a clock\nand plaque in remembrance of the Munich disaster.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uGALfd6wHPs/UXy-L5BEKBI/AAAAAAAAh3Q/yw5aHCHuj74/s1600/downloadPJIUBP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uGALfd6wHPs/UXy-L5BEKBI/AAAAAAAAh3Q/yw5aHCHuj74/s320/downloadPJIUBP.jpg\" height=\"239\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Alexander Chapman\n\"Alex\" Ferguson, CBE has been the manager of Manchester United since\n1986. After this Aston Villa EPL game , Ferguson had secured the 49th trophy of\nhis managerial career . His tenure has seen the club go through an era of\nsuccess and dominance both in England and in Europe, giving Ferguson a\nreputation as one of the most admired and respected managers in the history of\nthe game.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With 26 years as manager of Manchester United, he is the longest\nserving manager in soccer. Ferguson has won many awards and holds many records\nincluding winning Manager of the Year most times in British football history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was knighted in 1999\nfor his services to the game. &nbsp;His statue\nwas installed at Old Trafford on 23 November 2012. The North Stand was renamed\nas the Sir Alex Ferguson Stand on 5 November 2011, in honour of Alex Ferguson's\n25 years as manager of the club.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Fergusoncould spot talent.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ferguson bought Nemanja\nVidic for just \u00a37m from Spartak Moscow . He is worth his weight in gold as he\ncan anticipate the flight of the ball, position himself and is tough as nails.\nThe hooligans chant &nbsp;that ring around the\nground:<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> \"<i>He comes from Serbia, he'll\nfuckin\u201d murder ya</i>.\"</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tLSOoaFyyB8/UYr48KTvY7I/AAAAAAAAiF4/MYXSQSEhD0E/s1600/images.jpgbgjuluy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tLSOoaFyyB8/UYr48KTvY7I/AAAAAAAAiF4/MYXSQSEhD0E/s320/images.jpgbgjuluy.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had bought Cristiano\nRonaldo for &nbsp;\u00a312.25m from Sporting Lisbon,\narguably the world\u2019s most complete player at the moment with both brawn and\nbrains.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Y7cvlCo3UIY/UYr5CNRu_yI/AAAAAAAAiGA/BGV2PKYAgSA/s1600/htr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Y7cvlCo3UIY/UYr5CNRu_yI/AAAAAAAAiGA/BGV2PKYAgSA/s320/htr.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ferguson is famous for\nplaying \"mind games\" with fellow Premiership managers. &nbsp;He makes snide comments at a pre-match press\nconference about the opposition Manager or their team. This has led to several\nspats in the past with managers such as Kevin Keegan, Ars\u00e8ne Wenger, Rafael\nBen\u00edtez and Mark Hughes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kbnl3QhEDxM/UXy_2h3dOQI/AAAAAAAAh4I/idlTSF2AzGg/s1600/oldtraffordeaststandviewfull.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kbnl3QhEDxM/UXy_2h3dOQI/AAAAAAAAh4I/idlTSF2AzGg/s400/oldtraffordeaststandviewfull.jpg\" height=\"151\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ferguson has received numerous punishments for abusing\nand publicly criticising match officials and generally behaving like an a$$hole. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is a strict\ndisciplinarian, and can get cranky . His players nicknamed him Furious Fergie. &nbsp;He had fined one of his players, John Hewitt,\nfor overtaking him on a public road. I think this takes the cake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ferguson is infamous\nfor throwing crockery in the dressing room if players do not meet his exacting\nstandards. Many former players have recounted his infamous \"hairdrying\ntreatment\" in which he leans his face inches away from the player's and\nlaunches into a tirade, often lasting several minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2003, Ferguson was\ninvolved in a dressing room showdown with star United player David Beckham,\nresulting in a eyebrow injury to Beckham, caused by Ferguson kicking a football\nboot in anger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lMarCPfrFGE/UXy9_WJx6YI/AAAAAAAAh3I/MGvqmVqHrEg/s1600/article-0-045BC5D3000005DC-633_233x399.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lMarCPfrFGE/UXy9_WJx6YI/AAAAAAAAh3I/MGvqmVqHrEg/s320/article-0-045BC5D3000005DC-633_233x399.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"186\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">MEETING OF THE GODS</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">CYMATICS FOR A &nbsp;2.1 MILLION &nbsp;CONGREGATION &nbsp;ILANJITHARA MELAM</span> , &nbsp;KUDAMATTAM , &nbsp;PANCHAVADYAM &nbsp;, <span style=\"color: blue;\">VADAKUMNATHAN &nbsp;TEMPLE CONSECRATED BY LORD PARASHURAMA &nbsp;IN 4000 BC </span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">THRISSUR SHIVA TEMPLE WHERE ADI SHANKARACHARYA\nSHED HIS MORTAL BODY IN 2000 BC</span></b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> \u2013 &nbsp;CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yesterday the 36 hour\nmarathon Thrissur Pooram temple festival got over. &nbsp;In Kerala there is no bar of religion or caste when it\ncomes to this temple festival.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will put a video\nbelow. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/qWcAF7lf_Uk/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/qWcAF7lf_Uk&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/qWcAF7lf_Uk&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A video of such an electrifying event can only be a pale\nshadow of the real thing. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UTy977oFdtg/UXTJlU0-KLI/AAAAAAAAhv4/dF03ET2WUiM/s1600/llll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet you can\nfeel the energy of 21 lakh people including foreign tourists &nbsp;who come here to see the conscious pachyderms\nand feel the cymatics of the drums, trumpets and cymbals.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-57MdZkI3cbE/UXS6sNfLBHI/AAAAAAAAhvg/Yu3N4fduSUI/s1600/aaa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
