text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/IEwAry0GARw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/IEwAry0GARw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/IEwAry0GARw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A boomerang does funny\nthings because it is in fact a gyroscope.&nbsp;\nAerodynamic forces generate a twisting moment which cause the\n\"gyroscope\" to precess and to move on a circular path.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><i>F) Below video: Magnus force again-- check out how a golf ball with back spin will go soaring high.</i></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/23f1jvGUWJs/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/23f1jvGUWJs&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/23f1jvGUWJs&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these forces and\neffects are mentioned in our ancient Vedic texts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">Punch into Google\nsearch</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> MIHIRA MUNI , THE GREAT ASTROLOGER CUM ASTRONOMER VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why did the ping pong\nball stay steady in the air ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pressure inside the\nstream of air generated by the hairdryer was lower than the air swirling around\nit. This surrounding air pushed on all sides of the ball, which held it inside\nthe hairdryer air stream. Gravity stopped the ball from flying straight up into\nthe air. When hairdryer is tipped to a certain point the ball falls down. This\nis the point at which gravity was exerts a greater force on the ball than the\nair pressure does.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you can see Magnus\neffect is a push of air, Bernoulli's principle is the decreasing of pressure in\na stream of fluid. One pushes, the other pulls..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a golfer bashes a\nball with a back spin, the ball soars in the air, due to Magnus effect . &nbsp;When the ball lands from a height it spins\nbackwards on the grass. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f_xbr5Lo9io/UXIxZoN8xFI/AAAAAAAAhsY/DchD1wwmvVo/s1600/imagesii75.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"244\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f_xbr5Lo9io/UXIxZoN8xFI/AAAAAAAAhsY/DchD1wwmvVo/s320/imagesii75.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same effect can be seen\nin tennis when a player chops the ball with an under spin. The pressure\ndifferential, high on one side and low on the other, creates a lift force ( Magnus\nforce) that causes the ball to move in the direction of the pressure\ndifferential (i.e., from high to low).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cristiano Ronaldo is\none of the most feared free kick takers on this planet. &nbsp;This man is a superb athlete and his is\nintelligent &nbsp;for he can anticipate.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes he makes the\nball swerve in a unpredictable manner by kicking on the soccer ball air valve\nwith a toe shot. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ronaldo can also curve\nthe ball in air, with a banana kick using Magnus force. &nbsp;A banana kick is an off-center kick that makes\nthe ball curve in the air. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A curve ball\nis a nightmare for the goal keeper , as he is often blinded by the human wall.\nBy the time he sees the ball coming past the edge of the wall, it is too late.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nyou kick a soccer ball off-center it will spin. If you kick the right-hand side\nof the ball with the inside of your right foot, then it will spin in a\ncounter clockwise direction, but kick it on the left-hand side with the outside\nof your right foot and it will spin clockwise. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The greater the spin\nyou can put on the ball by using friction between the football boot and the\nball surface , and also more the offset of the kicked spot from the centre of\ngravity,&nbsp; the more the ball will swerve. &nbsp;On a rainy day with less friction between the\nboot and the ball, it will be difficult to spin the ball.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you see the free\nkick taken by Roberto Carlos for Brazil ( 1997 match against France) , he\nkicked the ball from a spot 115 feet from the goal, close to the corner of the\nD on the edge of the penalty area, at a great velocity of about 80 mph. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subsequent swerve was so dramatic that a\nball boy standing 33 feet to the side of the goal jumped out of his skin as he thought\nthe ball was gonna smash his head . But it &nbsp;swerved suddenly away from him and beat the astonished\ngoalkeeper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hLQguvrb4NY/UXKCne8XGGI/AAAAAAAAhtA/UY5DItnwEGE/s1600/imageserhtd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hLQguvrb4NY/UXKCne8XGGI/AAAAAAAAhtA/UY5DItnwEGE/s400/imageserhtd.jpg\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I6og5ns6-G4/UXKCulRlduI/AAAAAAAAhtI/nIVIxWg0h8g/s1600/imagesrj5er.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I6og5ns6-G4/UXKCulRlduI/AAAAAAAAhtI/nIVIxWg0h8g/s400/imagesrj5er.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the last World Cup\nin South Africa, ( where they galleries kept blowing those loud irritating horns ) there was\nconsiderable controversy . The FIFA soccer ball was new and light, and nobody\ncould get proper ball control\u2014and this included the best soccer players. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hardly anybody scored from &nbsp;long-range shots or free kicks. Players were\nsimply unable to control the swerve of the bal, because their coaching was no\ngood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the world cup,\nsport scientists used wind tunnel experiments, high-speed video camera\nanalysis, trajectory simulations, and computer modeling to get a hand of what\nis happening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the time of the\nHungarian Frenic Pushkas, the ball was too heavy. &nbsp;Whoever had more brute leg power he was a success. &nbsp;If Pushkas were to hit todays &nbsp;FIFA&nbsp;ball, it will swerve out of trajectory. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">David Beckham and\nRonaldo Beckham could make the ball &nbsp;rise\nup over the human wall and then down again so that it doesn't fly over the goal\npost bar. &nbsp;Beckham would literally caress\nthe ball &nbsp;with his foot like a tennis\nplayer, he used more ball control and less power.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yLQ7zpTbesw/UXFxsNqtdDI/AAAAAAAAhq4/Vjb_7ZDnWps/s1600/5719402.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yLQ7zpTbesw/UXFxsNqtdDI/AAAAAAAAhq4/Vjb_7ZDnWps/s400/5719402.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The power with which the ball\nis kicked and the amount of spin that is generated are inversely related. &nbsp;The ball will go straighter the harder you\nkick it. The ball will curve most when it slows down from turbulent flow into\nthe laminar flow regime. Good players like Ronaldo know how to get this transition\nto happen just after the ball has passed the human wall..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-scNKCF3dpgs/UXKItBNvrSI/AAAAAAAAhtQ/hnjPdINTuVU/s1600/sfwasc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-scNKCF3dpgs/UXKItBNvrSI/AAAAAAAAhtQ/hnjPdINTuVU/s320/sfwasc.jpg\" width=\"155\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnus effect is called\nafter German Jew Heinrich Gustav Magnus , who had access to Indian ancient\ntexts, thanks to German Jew Rothschild.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consider a ball that is spinning\nabout an axis perpendicular to the flow of air across it . The air travels\nfaster relative to the center of the ball where the periphery of the ball is\nmoving in the same direction as the airflow. This reduces the pressure,\naccording to<b> Bernouilli's principl</b>e.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RRDhVoBqEZg/UXIx3PYOomI/AAAAAAAAhsg/24H3EPYUq3A/s1600/imagesbrs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RRDhVoBqEZg/UXIx3PYOomI/AAAAAAAAhsg/24H3EPYUq3A/s1600/imagesbrs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nopposite effect happens on the other side of the ball, where the air travels\nslower relative to the center of the ball. There is therefore an imbalance in\nthe forces and the ball deflects . This lateral deflection of a ball in flight\nis generally known as the <b>\"Magnus effect\"</b>.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5F9Xh44ql1g/UXFyC20KjAI/AAAAAAAAhrI/7XKJMQADa9k/s1600/imagesfff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5F9Xh44ql1g/UXFyC20KjAI/AAAAAAAAhrI/7XKJMQADa9k/s320/imagesfff.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Magnus effect can\nbe applied in any direction, &nbsp;and in this\nway an athlete can create backspin, topspin, and sidespin. &nbsp;&nbsp;Tennis\nplayers and volleyball players use the Magnus effect when they apply topspin to\nmake the ball drop suddenly while in flight. &nbsp;A topspin combines with gravity\u2019s downward\npull, &nbsp;and this is why topspin forehands\nin tennis (and table tennis) arc viciously over the net and down toward the\ncourt. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A backspin, on the\nother hand, fights against gravity. The more spin, the more the ball will\n\u201chang\u201d in the air. &nbsp;Because the backspin\nis rotating in the opposing direction that the ball is traveling, the spin\ncauses the ball to slow down and even jump backward once it hits the court\nsurface. &nbsp;Experienced players are able to\n\u201cread\u201d the spin on the ball from the motion of their opponent\u2019s racket.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Magnus effect is NOT\nresponsible for the swing movement of the cricket ball in mid air. --although\nit does contribute to the motion known as drift in spin bowling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now , let me talk about\nswing bowling in Cricket. &nbsp;There is more\nto fu#kin' cricket than <i>Balla having a Mulaaqat\nwith gendh</i>. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The olden day Hindi cricket\ncommentators were pathetic\u2014&nbsp;<i>mulaqaat nahi\nho saka, &nbsp;isliye thappa khaane ke baad siddha\ngaya gendh wicket keeper ke haath mein.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Australian cricket\numpire Darrell Bruce Hair along with fellow Australian Simon Taufel, and New\nZealander Billy Bowden, was appointed to the ICC Elite umpire panel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Darrell Hair apparently\nwas a racist and he had problems with ze brown skins of Indian sub-continent\norigin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hair umpired his first\nTest match in January 1992, between Australia and India in Adelaide. The test\nwas won by Australia and according to the Wisden was \"marred \u2026 by\ncontroversy lbw decisions \u2013 eight times Indians were given out<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a match between\nAustralia and Sri Lanka in Melbourne, he no balled Muttiah Muralitharan seven\ntimes in three overs for chucking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the fourth day of\nthe fourth Test between England and Pakistan at The Oval, seeing the ball swinging the wrong way, Darrell Hair ruled\nthat the Pakistani team had been involved in ball tampering. &nbsp;He awarded five penalty runs to England and\noffered them a replacement ball. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nprotest the Pakistani players refused to take the field after the tea break.\nAfter 30 minutes the umpires removed the bails, declared England winners by\nforfeiture. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After an ICC board\nmeeting discussed his actions in a Test match between Pakistan and England in\n2006 it was decided he should not umpire matches involving the test playing\nnations.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an e-mail to the ICC\nHair wrote that he would resign from the ICC Elite Umpire Panel in return for a\nnon-negotiable one-off payment of US$500,000 directly into his bank account. How\nchweeet!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hair wrote that the\npayment was to compensate for the loss of future earnings and retainer payments<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wgOabMDM-vk/UXGRw2znESI/AAAAAAAAhrY/gL8CuyCyJVU/s1600/downloadtkv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wgOabMDM-vk/UXGRw2znESI/AAAAAAAAhrY/gL8CuyCyJVU/s200/downloadtkv.jpg\" width=\"176\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Sri Lankan\ncaptain, Arjuna Ranatunga, welcomed the decision saying that \"Hair had a\nprejudice against Asian teams. I am happy that he is finally out\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naseem Ashraf, chairman\nof the PCB, said \"Mr Hair was removed from the ICC panel of umpires\nbecause of his bad umpiring and his poor judgement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the whites still\nconsidered him the best. After all vicious and vulgar sledging and dubious umpiring\nhad taken them that far in world cricket.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the aftermath of the\nOval incident Hair was voted Umpire of the Season in a poll carried out by The\nWisden Cricketer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A leaked ICC report showed that before the\nOval incident, Hair was ranked the second-best umpire overall and number one in\ndecision-making. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In February 2007 Hair\nannounced he was suing the ICC and the Pakistan Cricket Board on grounds of\nracial discrimination\u2014how do you like that? The spiked fist is complaining\nagainst the bloodied nose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 22 August 2008 Hair\nhanded in his resignation to the ICC in order to take up a coaching role-good\nriddance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A West Indian umpire\ntoo had a problem with brown skins . Steve Bucknor &nbsp;was removed by the ICC from officiating in the\nthird Test between Australia and India in Perth after his several incorrect\ndecisions contributed to India's defeat in the second Test in Sydney in January\n2008. &nbsp;He was almost like a slave to the Aussies and the other white teams, for\nsurvival I guess. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subsequently he was\nremoved from officiating the next test match, after the Indian team got ready\nto break the tour forfeit the series and come home. Enough was enough. Sport\nmust be treated as sport,NOT highway robbery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But when BCCI got more\npowerful with financial clout, Steve Bucknor was booted out.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former umpire Dickie\nBird suggested that Bucknor had \"gone on too long\".</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steve Bucknor blamed\nIndia's financial power for his ouster\u2014 you are dang right maaan!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-u9WvSkRlYYY/UXGRrUcOTXI/AAAAAAAAhrQ/RE2Pfwcp9zg/s1600/uhviti.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-u9WvSkRlYYY/UXGRrUcOTXI/AAAAAAAAhrQ/RE2Pfwcp9zg/s400/uhviti.jpg\" width=\"327\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ICC confirmed on 23\nFebruary 2009 that Bucknor had decided to retire from umpiring in March 2009.\nGood riddance , again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pakistanis were often\ndiscriminated against for ball tampering. &nbsp;The thing was their fast bowler Sarfraz Nawaz\nfound a way to reverse swing the cricket ball, which none of the white skins\nknew. &nbsp;Sarfaz Nawaz did not know what\ncaused it,but he could do it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He passed\nthis trick on to Imran Khan who passed it on to Wasim Akram and Waqar Younis. &nbsp;&nbsp;Today\nit is no more a secret. Every cricketing country knows how to do this, and the\numpires too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So let me &nbsp;talk about out swing, in swing and reverse\nswing .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p7zwwfGVw6I/UXGS7vXZ6aI/AAAAAAAAhrg/i6KncJLOQ3o/s1600/tu5im6u.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p7zwwfGVw6I/UXGS7vXZ6aI/AAAAAAAAhrg/i6KncJLOQ3o/s400/tu5im6u.jpg\" width=\"290\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">In cricket swing bowling the ball is NOT spun.&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">The ball has a seam at the \u201cequator\u201d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m62IEzCY8Fo/UXIW89oCEZI/AAAAAAAAhrw/jcFHL8aJGpo/s1600/imagesl+hulkg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"198\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m62IEzCY8Fo/UXIW89oCEZI/AAAAAAAAhrw/jcFHL8aJGpo/s200/imagesl+hulkg.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One hemisphere is\npolished and other hemisphere is kept rough , which is natural wear and tear . &nbsp;&nbsp;If you\ntry to roughen the rough side side manually , or polish the polished side with Vaseline\netc this is ball tampering.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aoSVvpV5ffo/UXIXPMtSHcI/AAAAAAAAhr4/q-t_z0_kBCo/s1600/swingam.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aoSVvpV5ffo/UXIXPMtSHcI/AAAAAAAAhr4/q-t_z0_kBCo/s400/swingam.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\">Above:&nbsp; This is an </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">out swing</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\"> scenario. The polished\nside ( RH side ) has a smooth air flow,&nbsp;\nwhile the rough side ( LH side ) has turbulent flow.&nbsp; The seam is aimed at the second slip fielder.<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For inswing &nbsp;bowling , the opposite happens. The rough side of the ball is now kept to the RH\nside and polished side is kept to the LH side. The seam is now aimed to the LH\nside of the wicket keeper ( &nbsp;his left\nhand while facing the bowler ) -- just opposite to the outswing position..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO rocket\nscience here . The ball always swings to the rough side, where there is turbulent air flow.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine a boat in\nwater. &nbsp;You paint the underwater RH side\nsmooth and on the underwater LH side you have rough encrusted barnacles, the\nboat will tend to steer towards the rough side. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now imagine just like the &nbsp;seam of the cricket ball &nbsp;, the boat\u2019s sharp bow is also twisted to the\nleft. &nbsp;The boat will turn more readily to\nthe left.&nbsp; Even a retarded child can visualize\nthis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For successful swing\nbowling, &nbsp;the ball should be released so\nthat it spins along the seam ( backwards ) to get minimal wobble. &nbsp;Wind-tunnel tests on spinning cricket balls\nshow that the maximum side force is generated at about 70 mph with the seam\nangled at 20 degrees and the ball spinning backwards at 11 revolutions/second.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6vK27k_TAOs/UXInNRE9NSI/AAAAAAAAhsA/r48b4MIRc78/s1600/imagesiovti.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"176\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6vK27k_TAOs/UXInNRE9NSI/AAAAAAAAhsA/r48b4MIRc78/s200/imagesiovti.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dry hot sunny days\ndon\u2019t favour swing bowling, whereas overcast sky and wet pitches with moisture\nevaporating , are found to be most conducive for swing bowling.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good swing bowling is virtually unplayable,\n&nbsp;especially if the batsman has NO dang idea\nwhich is the rough/ shiny side of the ball.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are facing a\ngood swing bowler , you can reduce the chances of getting out either nicking\noff to the slips by playing defensively with soft hands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Off swing bowler\u2019s\nfollow through is across his chest, while the inswing bowler\u2019s action is a bit\nweird with follow though coming in a straight line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fast bowlers rely on\nsheer pace to dismiss batsmen, but the fast bowlers who bag more wickets are\nthe ones who know the art of swing bowling without a wobbly seam , by using back\nspin.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Opening batsmen must\nknow how to anticipate swing . Or they will be back to the pavilion in a deep\nsulk sooner rather than later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fluid mechanics of\nswing bowling is about &nbsp;turbulent and\nlaminar airflow. &nbsp;Laminar air hugs the\nsurface of the smooth side of the ball , separates from the surface of the ball\nearlier than turbulent flow air.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The air separation point is more towards the front\nof the ball on the laminar flow side than on the turbulent side, &nbsp;where air hugs the surface and separates only\nafter reaching the backside of the ball, with lesser push than on the other\nsmooth side \u2014 thus giving a swing to the ball with the seam still steady.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or put your brain in pickle by remembering that\na </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">shiny side moves faster\nthrough the air then the rough side. <i>&nbsp;Seedhi baath hai!</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me talk about\nreverse swing.&nbsp; &nbsp;Even the best coaches and the best bowlers of\nreverse swing do NOT know the theory behind it. &nbsp;It does NOT happen by accident. It is made to\nhappen.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3Ud2siPlJRI/UXIwa9EcjkI/AAAAAAAAhsI/Bk8WRaUKp_I/s1600/65913convenstional+swing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3Ud2siPlJRI/UXIwa9EcjkI/AAAAAAAAhsI/Bk8WRaUKp_I/s400/65913convenstional+swing.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal swing occurs\nmostly when the ball is new. As it wears more, it is more difficult to extract\na large amount of swing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse swing occurs in\nexactly the same manner as conventional swing, despite popular misconception.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Previously it swung towards the pointed seam--now it swings away from the pointed seam.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ball normally\nstarts reverse swinging after about 35 overs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bowler who could only bowl outswingers at\nthe onset with the new ball can now bowl inswingers with an older ball without\nany change in the grip or bowling action \u2013he just points the flattened seam the\nopposite way. &nbsp;&nbsp;The ball swings towards the same rough side .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With reverse swing,\nboth sides of the ball are rough, but now the seam has more of an effect. &nbsp;The polished side has become a bit rough due\nto wear and is now heavy due to moisture and oil ingress , due to &nbsp;body oils and fluids. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bumps appear on the polished side, due to the\nnon-uniform nature of the expansion due to moisture ingress into leather . The\nshiny side has water pockets in it and is heavier &nbsp;whilst the rough side has air pockets and is\nlighter. The centre of gravity of the cricket ball has shifted off centre\ntowards the shiny heavier side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">These raised bumps invariably\ncreates valleys, which hold the air in the same manner as the rough side.&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">The turbulent boundary is thicker on this bumpy valley side&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;from the ball surface .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse swing can be done only by fast\nbowlers. . Unlike conventional swing, reverse swing will swing the ball in the\ndirection the seam is NOT pointing. ( read the NOT part well ) . Remember, the\nseam stays in position and upright because of the backward spin given to the ball..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M82D7zv2DU8/UXI1sYJxxcI/AAAAAAAAhso/6kM9G-E_9iw/s1600/_40694910_reverse_swing2.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"374\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M82D7zv2DU8/UXI1sYJxxcI/AAAAAAAAhso/6kM9G-E_9iw/s400/_40694910_reverse_swing2.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse swing is more\nlethal because the ball swings very late.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reverse swing is more effective\nwith a low sling shot arm action like fast bowlers Lasith Malinga or Waqar\nYounis, &nbsp;who make the ball swing VERY late \u2013\nwhich is virtually unplayable..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 28, 2018 at 5:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt, how does the static electricity that you mentioned work on a cricket ball both when it is old and new? Players have surreptitiously used saliva sweetened by chewing gum, vaseline and hair gels to maintain the shine on one side of the ball and other abrasive objects like bottle caps, zippers, sandpaper on the other side to induce reverse swing on a softer, older ball. The australians got caught now but to be honest, every team probably does it to some extent which explains very often why the ball starts reversing around the 30th and 40th over in test matches itself where ptherwise it probably might not until much later. It is certain that the Australians have been doing things to the ball for some time now and it was only a commentator who told the cameraman to keep an eye on them that enabled them to be caught red-handed now. Would appreciate it if you shed more light on this.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1948470066\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_65B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4008207738538352961\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
